ITTIA DB SQL C++ API Reference  8.4.1
storage::types::BindTraits< T > Struct Template Reference

Bind traits are used to bind a C or C++ data type to a storage::data::Row object or get/set a storage::data::Field object. This template class is specialized for each data type. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
struct storage::types::BindTraits< T >

Bind traits are used to bind a C or C++ data type to a storage::data::Row object or get/set a storage::data::Field object. This template class is specialized for each data type.

Bind traits are provided for most simple C data types. Bind traits can support both simple value types and classes which encapsulate and provide access to a variable of a supported type.

Some types are read-only, either because they are declared const or because the data size cannot be inferred from the type system. Read-only types can be used with storage::data::Field::set(), but are not compatible with storage::data::Row::bind() or storage::data::Field::get().

Template Parameters
TBind type
